Name: Don't Get Hit In The Face
About the game: Don't Get Hit In The face is a movement-based active virtual reality game. Do whatever you need to do... duck, weave, dodge and crawl... just don't get hit in the face! Taking gameplay influences from old-school arcade games and combining that with room-scale VR, DGHITF is as simple as it sounds, and that's what makes it fun. Don't Get Hit In The Face includes 4 game modes of increasing difficulty, and an awesome 13 song soundtrack. It's fun on its own as VR arcade game, and is also an excellent addition to a VR workout regimen.
